front.title: <>Space Slug
front.gametext: * Ferocity = two destiny. Habitat: Big One (Cave is now Belly). Attacks starfighters (defeated cards are eaten or relocated to Belly, opponent of victim chooses). Once per turn, may open or close mouth.
front.lore: Immense spaceborn predator. Consumes minerals, mynocks and the occasional passing starfighter. Lives in asteroid caves. Only one meter long at birth.
